Most popular transport

The most popular means of transportation is cycle. There are several advantages and disadvantages of bike. Second Most popular Transport

The second most popular transportation is train. This way could be good for environment and it could reduce the cost of time because of the quickly speed. Also, the train station always nearly so that students could be more covenient. But there are some problems for this transportation ways. Students could afford expensive tickets to go to university and when the rush hour, it is so crowed in the train. Sometimes, the train could be late or even cancelled so that students may not have been able to attend the class on time.

Recommendation

There are some recommendations for university. The university could create a safe place for bikes and produce the changing rooms for student to change their dress. And for students who chose train as their vehicle, university could give some subsidy to students for decreasing the cost of traffic, and then, university also could start the lessons later to avoid the rush hour.
